name: A Woman's Greed (Cutie Jules)
description:
Overview
A Woman's Greed is a small adventure game consisting of many JRPG-style battles against enemies and bosses, some puzzles, and a story that takes place in a mansion that was deemed abandoned.

Plot
Ruby Kaylock is a model student at the University of Magic of Knightbourne, one day she receives a letter from the Rector, asking her to investigate the strange waves of magic that have been going berserk around the city, especially in the forest.

Ruby will accept this mission and proceed to investigate the forest, but what will happen next will make her regret this decision.

She will be mysteriously teleported in an abandoned basement, and will have to find her way out.

Soon, Ruby will discover that this basement belongs to the old Cromwell Family and that she is inside their mansion.

And she is absolutely not alone.

Features
The game features both exploration and combat.

In the exploration section the player will have to interact with objects and solve puzzles to progress in the game.

In the combat section the player will have to fight off enemies using spells or a sword. Every enemy has its weaknesses and resistances, I designed at least one combination of attacks to defeat any enemy, but there could be more.

With the exception of a certain item and a certain part of the game, it is not possible to use restoring items during battle. So be sure to always heal after a fight.

As of now, there are only two endings achievable.

Credits
The full credits can be found inside the game and in the text files.

Music by:

- Eric Matyas @ Sound Image

- Patrick de Arteaga @ Patrick's Music

Art by:

- Soramani

- VIBRATO
